titleStmt.title: The title of the resource
The abbreviated title of the resource
The title that identifies the resource with another denomination

persName.forename: The first letter of the author's name
persName.idno: The database that aggregates global information, creating a unique ID for authors and cultural figures
The code that uniquely identifies authors and creators, distinguishing people with the same name

persName.forename: The first letter of the curator's name
persName.idno: The database that aggregates global information, creating a unique ID for authors and cultural figures
The code that uniquely identifies authors and creators, distinguishing people with the same name

respStmt.orgName: The name of the organisation that has curated the digital resource

persName.forename: The first letter of the facsimilist's name
persName.idno: The database that aggregates global information, creating a unique ID for authors and cultural figures
The code that uniquely identifies authors and creators, distinguishing people with the same name

respStmt.orgName: The name of the organisation that is the author of the digitalization of the resource

edition.note: The edition of the digital resource (e.g. first, second, third, ...)
The format of the digital resource (fac-simile, trascription, critical edition)

publicationStmt.publisher: The name of organisation responsible for the publication or distribution of the digital resource
publicationStmt.idno: Form of identifier used to identify some object, such as a bibliographic item, a person, a title, an organisation
A unique string of letters and numbers assigned to an electronic document
publicationStmt.date: The publication date of the digital resource
publicationStmt.pubPlace: The name of the place where the digital resource was published
publicationStmt.authority: The name of a person or other agency responsible for making the resource available, other than a publisher or distributor

availability.p: Information about the availability of a resource (for example any restrictions on its use or distribution, its copyright status, any licence applying to it, etc)

ref.desc: The title of the external image
The title of the external document
The title of the internal image
The title of the internal document

note.note: Information about the repository where the digital material is stored
The archival code associated with the digital resource
note.ref: A hyperlink to additional resources or information related to the repository or the materials in question
note.note: An editorial note or annotation about the resource
A note or annotation about the original edition of the resource

persName.forename: The first letter of the author's name
persName.idno: The database that aggregates global information, creating a unique ID for authors and cultural figures
The code that uniquely identifies authors and creators, distinguishing people with the same name

persName.forename: The first letter of the illustrator's name
persName.idno: The database that aggregates global information, creating a unique ID for authors and cultural figures
The code that uniquely identifies authors and creators, distinguishing people with the same name

respStmt.orgName: The name of the organisation that provides drawings, diagrams etc. to support the main content

persName.forename: The first letter of the printer's name
persName.idno: The database that aggregates global information, creating a unique ID for authors and cultural figures
The code that uniquely identifies authors and creators, distinguishing people with the same name

respStmt.orgName: The name of the organisation that is involved in the production of a manifestation of printed text, notated music, etc

editionStmt.edition: The edition of the print resource (e.g. first, second, third, ...)

publicationStmt.publisher: The name of organisation responsible for the publication or distribution of the print resource
publicationStmt.date: The publication date of the print resource
publicationStmt.pubPlace: The name of the place where the print resource was published

availability.licence: Information about a licence or other legal agreement applicable to the resource

notesStmt.note: The volume number or the tome number of the resource
The format of the resource (refers to the physical sheet size of the resource, such as 8&, 12&)
The total number of documents contained in the resource
Information about the repository where the print material is stored
The archival code associated with the print resource

encodingDesc.p: Information about the presence or the absence of the text encoding

samplingDecl.p: A prose description of the rationale and methods used in selecting texts, or parts of a text, for inclusion in the resource

langUsage.language: A single language or sublanguage used within the resource
A single language or sublanguage used within the resource

abstract.p: A summary or formal abstract added by the encoder

keywords.term: A single-word, multi-word, or phrase identifying the topic or nature of the resource
A single-word, multi-word, or phrase identifying the topic or nature of the resource
A single-word, multi-word, or phrase identifying the topic or nature of the resource

change.desc: A brief description of the object of the revision
A brief description of the object of the revision
